All Academic Finance Transport Packing

How to get scholarships... Packing essentials... Booking your flights... Applying for housing...
WSU and Bayreuth Uni deadlines for applications are all in May, make sure you have submitted everything ahead of time! For help with this please reach out to your Study Abroad advisor.
